title: Multiple interactions part of circular flow

content.prompt:
The circular flow of economic activity between consumers and producers includes which of the following?

  1. Households buy factor services from firms.

  2. Households sell factor services to firms.

  3. Households buy outputs from firms.

  4. Households sell outputs to firms.

unit.text: 2: Economic Indicators and the Business Cycle

skill.text: Skill 1.B: Identify an economic concept, principle, or model illustrated by an example.
